sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Your age is 27?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You have a wife and child?

sp.speaker: Shoma
sp.p: I live alone

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You like curry?

sp.speaker: Shoma
sp.p: I like ramen.

sp.speaker: staff1
sp.p: Santa Dodoria sure is something.

sp.speaker: staff2
sp.p: So flamboyantly wrong.

sp.speaker: staff1
sp.p: There's no way such a young idol could have a wife and a kid.

sp.speaker: staff1
sp.p: Even I can see that.

sp.speaker: staff2
sp.p: Is it okay to air that as-is?

sp.speaker: staff1
sp.p: Should be okay.

sp.speaker: staff2
sp.p: Nobody would be so pissed off at a local program like this one.

sp.speaker: driver
sp.p: You're Santa Dodoria, aren't you? I saw you on TV the other day. Do you really have psychic powers?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Here's fine. Drop me off.

sp.speaker: driver
sp.p: Huh? It's not like I'm trying to insult you or anything. I just wanted you to show me.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: If you don't wanna die, hurry on and scram.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Come on now, I thought you brought over yet another scumbag.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: But this one isn't even human. Sheesh. My grandkid only brings problems in.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: My skin's gonna get dry from all the stress. Come on. Bring it on.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: That was close! You're super fast! But things happened just as I predicted.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I thought you'd come around to my blind spot.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You fell into the trap that I had set up beforehand.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: If you cross that line, you'll die. That's a barrier right there. When you drive a warding nail inside this circle, the inside of the circle turns into a barrier.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: But if you drive it outside the circle, the area outside of the circle becomes the barrier. The reason you couldn't touch me was because I was protected by a barrier.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: I'll make sure to eat and k*ll you. Don't think you can keep me trapped forever.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I don't wanna trap you. I wanna k*ll you. Come on, stand your ground, will ya? You're gonna cross that line! What's wrong? When you're in there, you can't make use of your speed that you're so proud of.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: You scummy old hag!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Did an old hag just call another old hag a scummy old hag? That pisses me off.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: If you burn me, this guy that I cursed will die, too.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I'll k*ll off all scumbags who deceive my grandkid. Even if they're human. Bye.

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: Scummy old hag!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Okarun! Hey, you were home?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Shut up. I'm watching The Idiot Shogun.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Anyway, I have something to talk about with you.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You went to a spiritual hotspot?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I did. Not me, but a friend.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Why?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: "Why?" Because we were talking and that's how things ended up.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: The Idiot Shogun is Japan's national treasure.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, were you listening? Anyway, did you see a guy? He'll be in big trouble if I'm not around!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: If you're talking about the evil spirit, I k*lled it.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: An evil spirit? What kind? Did it have glasses on?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Come on, you don't even believe in ghosts. Besides, I'm a fake spirit medium.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: How long are you gonna hold that grudge, you scummy old hag. Something really bad might happen, so just answer me!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Stop it. Don't believe in those stories. There are no evil spirits, and I'm a fake.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Grandma. I'm sorry. I was wrong. So please tell me. What did you do to the evil spirit?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Head over to the main shrine.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Scummy old hag! If something's wrong with Okarun, I'll never forgive you!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I didn't want to miss my chance. He was just an occult freak who simply wanted friends. It's my fault. Because I forced him to go to that place! I'm sorry, Okarun! Okarun!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase! I'm so glad! I thought that I'd m*rder*d you or something. Huh? Wait. Miss Ayase? Miss Ayase?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You're still alive and well, scumbag four-eyes! What? What's up with that?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Well, I'm sorry I'm still alive!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'm so irritated.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Since when have you started being friends with monsters?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You scared me!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: The curse won't kick in as long as he's in there. But one step outside, and he's back to a monster.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What was that about k*lling him off? You lied to me.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You seemed pretty desperate. You into brats like that?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way! Turbo Granny took his you-know-what. And she told me that as long as she has it, his curse won't be lifted. I'm responsible for what happened to him, so I just want to do something about it.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Oh, I see. So you do like him.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I didn't say that! Anyway, I can use psychic powers now.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: What the hell are you talkin' about?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I went to this place where UFOs show up. A lot of stuff happened there, and now I can use powers.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: But UFOs don't exist.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I totally get that reaction. I was just like that until yesterday.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Anyway, it's true that I can use psychic powers now. And if I'm not holding back Okarun's curse with it, he goes wild.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I'm sure psychic powers exist.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I don't know what your criteria for believing stuff is.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Anyway, Turbo Granny, huh? You sure got your hands on a troublesome one.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: In the past, she used to be called the Hundred Kilo Granny. She's a modern yokai monster that wreaked havoc all over the country. And I heard such an elusive entity had been dwelling for some time in that tunnel.I went over there once to check things out.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: It was most strange. I couldn't even get near the tunnel because of just how strong the spiritual power was. You know about location-bound spirits? They're spirits that stay in particular locations that they have strong attachments to. They're basically the strongest within their territories. No spirit medium would go up against a location-bound spirit. There was a location-bound spirit inside that tunnel. Do you know what that means? Turbo Granny and that location-bound spirit had fused together.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Don't try to fight against it. I don't want to lose my dear grandchild.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You're not directly involved with it, either. So forget about him. You should return to everyday life.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I wonder what the Mr. Ken I love would do in times like this. When I can't decide, that's what I think. I've never had regret by choosing this way. And if this was Mr. Ken, I'm 100% positive he'd go in and help. So that's what I'm gonna do!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Mr. Ken, you say? -You're totally in love with that kid!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No, that's not what I mean! I wasn't talking about him!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Hey, she's confessing your love to you. How do you feel?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I told you that's not what I mean! I'm talking about the actor!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Looks like I got no choice if you're gonna go that far. Go play tag with Turbo Granny. That thing has absolute confidence in its running. A few random taunts and it's sure to take the challenge. Now this is where the problem starts. The location-bound spirit's territory is all of Shono City.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You have to lure Turbo Granny outside of the city without getting caught. If you can drag it away from its territory, it will get weak and even you guys will be able to defeat it.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh no, look at these feeble legs. There's no way in hell I can play tag against Turbo Granny. Instead of doing something like that, can't you make something like those barriers and deal with it? Like putting one up at the tunnel.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I can't do that. I can't help out to begin with.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Huh? What's up with that?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: My barrier spells only borrow the powers of the gods that live on this land. Once we leave Kamigoe City where we live, I can't use these powers.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, so we have our own territory, too.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: All lands have their own gods. The problem is whether you're playing a home or an away game. In any case, this is the only way to defeat Turbo Granny. If you start physically training now, you should be able to become fast enough to run away from her.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Are you seriously saying that? No matter how hard I tried, I couldn't even make it to the prefecture finals for track meets!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I'm not talking about you.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Huh?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I'm talking about him.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, I see!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: You're finally including me into the conversation?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Sorry, I forgot.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: But Okarun, you have no stamina.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: None at all.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: And I have to keep control over your curse.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Then he needs to run piggy-backing Momo.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase, how much do you weigh?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hey, do ya wanna die?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Oh no, it's just impossible! My limit for going full strength in cursed mode is about twice!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Right!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Then train so that you can always be at full strength. Get to it. Push-ups, sit-ups, back extensions, and squats. Five sets, 100 reps each.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Huh?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Do it. And Momo, same goes for your psychic powers. You need to power them up more than what they are now. As I can't be of any help, you guys simply have to get stronger. So I will be training the two of you. Go to sleep for today. We'll start tomorrow. Four-eyes, start your physical training right now.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Oh, okay. Your granny is so young.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Isn't she annoying?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase, I'm so sorry.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: When I fought that big thing, I was honestly too desperate to think of anyone other than myself. I'm really sorry.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, there's nothing you could've done about that.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: But Miss Ayase, you were different. You saved me and defeated the monster. But if something like that happens again, I'll do my best so that I can save you. So please don't be disappointed with me. Please, don't stop being a friend.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I wouldn't be disappointed. You're overthinking.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Then why did you slam the door earlier?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: W-Well, that was…

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: See, there you go! You really were disappointed!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I said I wasn't! But like, I am right now! You're such a pain!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm sorry.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You were pretty awesome when you were fighting. But you're kinda dense, Okarun. I'll probably be saving you next time, too! You sleep there for today. I'll bring you a futon right now.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase! Um, well… I'm… really thirsty, so can I have some water?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Can I take this barley tea?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Sure thing.

sp.speaker: Tv
sp.p: We have some shocking news that just came in! It came out into the open that popular idol Shoma had a secret child! And his age wasn't 20, but actually 27!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: They need to correct his favorite food from ramen to curry, too!

sp.speaker: Tv
sp.p: Furthermore… …he and his partner… …have not… …formally submitted… …a marriage license.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I could care less about that news.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Miss Ayase!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Crap! Okarun wants to go to the bathroom!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Just go.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No, but this is seriously bad news! If something blocks my view and I can't see Okarun, my spell on him breaks! In other words, I have to watch Okarun as he relieves himself!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Then watch him.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I'd never want to watch!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Who would show you, anyway? That tramples upon someone else's dignity! Hey! Don't look away!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Don't you have any good ideas?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Dunno. How the hell are you holding the curse back to begin with, anyway?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Let's see… How do I put it… It's like I can see an aura around Okarun.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: An aura?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: And when I crush that aura with my hands, the aura shrinks. And the curse subsides, I guess? Everyone has some kind of aura, and they come in all sorts of colors. I see them on the trees and rocks there too. I can grab all those auras and move them at my will, though only in a small area.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I see. I thought psychic powers were a lot more omnipotent. Sounds like they're quite limited.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: It was a lot more amazing the moment the powers awoke inside of me. That was when everything I imagined turned into reality, like I was invincible!But that went away real quick. I can only grab auras and stuff now.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Momo, close your eyes for a bit.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way. If I do that, my spell will be lifted.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Basically, the problem is the reliance on your vision. Try using all of your senses, such as touch. The fact that you can grab the aura means that it's tactile. So close those eyes and try feeling the aura with your skin. Slowly, feel it around you.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: So cold. How am I doing?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Yeah. He's transformed. No good.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Well, crap.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: That really pushed me close to the limit! I won't last much longer!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: What are you gonna do, Momo? He's gonna poop any moment.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You're the one who told me to try that!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I don't want to be watched as I relieve myself! But I wanna pee in my pants even less!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Hold on!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm gonna borrow your bathro--

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You've got some nerve to take a dump in someone else's house, punk!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm pretty desperate too, you know!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Why you little… Who said they'd lend you the bathroom?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Are you an absolute idiot? I can piss right here if you want!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Let me in on this too!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Don't think you can run faster than me in this house!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Outta my way! Or you'll have a disaster!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Not bad, Ken Takakura!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: This one is mine!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Not letting you!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: This is humiliating.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Says you.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I had looked forward to experiences unknown until now, like getting abducted by aliens.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Seriously?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: But this is just too much. I want to hurry up and be released from this curse.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Momo, you said that you were invincible when your powers first awoke.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Yeah.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: That's likely your original power. And it seems for some reason, that power has been sealed off.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What's with that? It sounds kinda cool.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: It's a pain in the butt. You have to unleash it bit by bit through training, and we don't know how long that will take. Though it's okay because it looks like that boy's physical makeover will take some time.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I have to be watched while going to the bathroom for a while?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: That's my line…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Grandma, it's here! Turbo Granny! Grandma? Grandma?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Damn you! What the hell are you doing to Grandma?

sp.speaker: turboGranny
sp.p: I'm letting her choose her cause of death. A heart attack or a stroke. My curse is contagious through this brat. Any human this brat sees, I can curse to death. Don't underestimate me. I'm not gonna give you any time. Come to the tunnel tonight. Otherwise, I'll use this brat to curse everyone around there to death. That's tonight. Got that?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: A nosebleed…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Grandma!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: What's this?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: You're bleeding from your ears, too! Does your head hurt or something?

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Momo. Let's hear about what just happened.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Am I seriously wearing this?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: It's hard to see in front of me.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: That's a bulletproof vest against evil spirits. Make sure to keep them on. If you let your guard down, you'll die quite easily.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I know that! Despite how we look, we did defeat aliens!

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: There's no such thing as aliens. Quit horsing around.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Oh, okay.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: You bring all the trouble home in the first place because you're like that. You've never listened to me ever since you were a little kid.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Man, so annoying! Grandma's nagging is annoying. Let's go, Okarun.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Momo!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: What now? You're so naggy.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: Don't die.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Yeah.

sp.speaker: Seiko
sp.p: I beg of you. Please, protect those two.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Why are we going by train?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: It's too far by bicycle! And you don't want to use up your stamina before we get there! You seriously aren't getting off the hook, Turbo Granny!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: I'm sorry, this is all for…

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: No way! That hag tried to hurts omething dear to me! I'm gonna beat Turbo Granny into a pulp!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Hold on, Miss Ayase You shouldn't do that here!

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: I want to hurry up and take these off.

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Is it okay to do that? It's a battle uniform to protect yourself from evil spirits, right? Your grandmother said keep it on.

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Who the hell would wear something like that? Fashion is the battle uniform for gyarus! I can't get hyped up unless I wear the clothes I want to wear!

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Why are you smiling?

sp.speaker: Momo
sp.p: Isn't this kinda fun?

sp.speaker: Ken
sp.p: Not at all. I feel like I'm about to puke.
